simulator.payloads
Class DoorPositionPayload

java.lang.Object
  simulator.payloads.Payload
      simulator.payloads.PhysicalPayload
          simulator.payloads.DoorPositionPayload
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Payload>, InternalPayload
public class DoorPositionPayload
extends PhysicalPayload
implements InternalPayload

Internal framework message indicates how far open a door is. If value is 0, the door is fully closed. If value is 50, the door is fully open. Initialized to 0.
